title: CYTI
summary: CYTI is a smart contract that allows entities to mint tokens with a specific character sequence at the beginning of the token ID. A token minter creates a CYTI request, and miners use the CYTI miner software to generate the proper token ID. When a miner succeeds, they receive the fee from the CYTI contract, and the token with the right ID is sent to the token minter.

qa_pairs.question: What is the full form of CYTI?
qa_pairs.answer: CYTI stands for Choose Your Token ID.

qa_pairs.question: What is the purpose of the CYTI smart contract?
qa_pairs.answer: The CYTI smart contract allows an entity to mint tokens with a given character sequence at the beginning of the token ID.

qa_pairs.question: How does the CYTI minting process work?
qa_pairs.answer: A token minter creates a CYTI request, and miners generate the proper token ID using the CYTI miner software. When a miner succeeds, they receive the fee from the CYTI contract, and the token with the right token ID is sent to the token minter.

qa_pairs.question: What are the key components of the CYTI system?
qa_pairs.answer: The key components of the CYTI system are the CYTI smart contract, the CYTI miner software, and the token minter.

qa_pairs.question: What are the potential applications of the CYTI system?
qa_pairs.answer: The CYTI system can be used by entities to mint tokens with a specific character sequence at the beginning of the token ID.

sections.heading: CYTI
sections.content: [CYTI](https://github.com/ThierryM1212/cyti) is the acronym for Choose Your Token ID. The team built a ‘minable’ smart contract that will allow an entity “to mint tokens with a given character sequence at the beginning of the token ID. A token minter creates a CYTI request, and miners generate the proper token ID using the CYTI miner software. When one of the miners succeeds, [they receive] the fee from the CYTI contract and the token with the right token ID is sent to the token minter.”
